/*
进行local数据存储管理的工具模块
 */import store from'store';var USER_KEY='user_key';export default{/*
  保存user
   */saveUser:function saveUser(user){// localStorage.setItem(USER_KEY, JSON.stringify(user))
store.set(USER_KEY,user);},/*
  读取user
   */getUser:function getUser(){// return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(USER_KEY) || '{}')
return store.get(USER_KEY)||{};},/*
  删除user
   */removeUser:function removeUser(){// localStorage.removeItem(USER_KEY)
store.remove(USER_KEY);}};
